name: Rules of Engagement
summary_text: An attorney defends an officer on trial for ordering his troops to fire on civilians after they stormed a U.S. embassy in a Middle Eastern country.

name: Maude
summary_text: "All In The Family" spin-off centered around Edith's cousin, Maude Findlay, a liberal, independent woman living in Tuckahoe, NY.

name: Quadrophenia
summary_text: Jimmy loathes his job and parents. He seeks solace with his mod clique, scooter riding and drugs, only to be disappointed.

name: The Ring Two
summary_text: 6 months after the incidents involving the lethal videotape, new clues prove that there is a new evil lurking in the darkness.

name: Hunted
summary_text: "The company of wolves is better than that of man." Once upon a frenzied time, Woman meets Man. Woman dances with Man. Man kisses Woman. Man grips Woman. Woman escapes Man. Man chases Woman - nothing new. Or is there?

name: Nocturne
summary_text: An incredibly gifted pianist makes a Faustian bargain to overtake her older sister at a prestigious institution for classical musicians.

name: Henry & June
summary_text: Anaïs Nin meets the American writer, Henry Miller, in Paris in 1931. She keeps a diary of her sexual awakening which includes Henry and his wife, June.

name: Kirgin Çiçekler
summary_text: "Eylül" is a 16 year old girl sexually harassed by her stepfather , yet her mother did not believe her and she took "Eylül" to the orphanage , and left her daughter there. Then Eylül become...                See full summary »

name: Money Monster
summary_text: Financial TV host Lee Gates and his producer Patty are put in an extreme situation when an irate investor takes them and their crew as hostage.

name: Small Wonder
summary_text: The zany adventures of a suburban family, their next-door neighbors, and an innovative robot designed to look like a human child.

name: The Alfred Hitchcock Hour
summary_text: A continuation of the dramatic anthology series Alfred Hitchcock Presents (1955) hosted by the Master of Suspense and Mystery.

name: Love & Anarchy
summary_text: Sofie, a career driven consultant and married mother of two. When Sofie gets an assignment to modernize an old publishing house she meets young IT tech Max, and an unexpected flirting game begins.

name: Aftermath
summary_text: Two strangers' lives become inextricably bound together after a devastating plane crash.

name: Almost Heroes
summary_text: Two bumbling explorers hope to beat Lewis & Clarke to the Pacific Ocean as they race across America's western frontier in the early 1800's.

name: Zapped!
summary_text: A high school science nerd gains telekinetic powers after a laboratory accident and uses them for revenge upon bullies.

name: Unleashed
summary_text: A man enslaved by the mob since childhood and raised into behaving like a human attack dog escapes his captors and attempts to start a new life.

name: OtherLife
summary_text: After inventing a drug that induces time-compressed virtual realities, young Ren grapples with partner Sam over how to use their powerful creation.

name: The Beach House
summary_text: A romantic getaway for two troubled college sweethearts turns into a struggle for survival when unexpected guests - and the surrounding environment - exhibit signs of a mysterious infection.

name: Nova Vita
summary_text: A wealthy entrepreneur must face his corrupt business partner and a sinister organization in order to get his life back.

name: Black Butler
summary_text: A young boy sells his soul to a demon in order to avenge his family's death and successfully lead their influential toy manufacturing company. The demon takes the form of a loyal butler who's always dressed in black and is required to protect, serve and arrive whenever summoned by his young master Ciel.

name: Doom: Annihilation
summary_text: A group of UAC Marines respond to a distress call from a top secret scientific base on Phobos, a moon around Mars, only to discover it's been overrun by demons who seek to create Hell on Earth.

name: Angels Crest
summary_text: The disappearance of a 3-year-old boy divides a tightly knit community and culls out its secrets.

name: Now Apocalypse
summary_text: While on quests to pursue love, sex, and fame with his friends in Los Angeles, Ulysses' premonitory dreams make him question the possible presence of a dark and monstrous conspiracy.

name: Keanu
summary_text: When the adorable kitten of an L.A. crime kingpin unexpectedly enters the life of two cousins, they will have to go through tough gangs, pitiless hit-men, and ruthless drug dealers who all claim him, to get him back. How hard can it be?

name: The Finder
summary_text: An Iraq war vet suffers a brain injury that triggers the ability to see connections between seemingly unrelated events, objects or people.

name: Escape to Athena
summary_text: A World War II adventure involving a group of Allied P.O.W.s, Nazis, black market priceless art treasures, Greek resistance, a Greek monastery, and a secret German rocket base.

name: Homunculus
summary_text: Truth and illusion blurs when a homeless amnesiac awakens from an experimental medical procedure with the ability to see people's innermost traumas.

name: Untitled My Little Pony Movie
summary_text: After the time of the Mane 6, Sunny--a young Earth Pony--and her new Unicorn friend Izzy explore their world and strive to restore Harmony to Equestria.

name: Absolute Power
summary_text: Career thief Luther Whitney (Clint Eastwood) witnesses a horrific crime involving U.S. President Alan Richmond (Gene Hackman).

name: Biutiful
summary_text: A man dying of cancer tries his best to leave the world on his own terms.

name: Message in a Bottle
summary_text: A woman discovers a tragic love letter in a bottle on a beach, and is determined to track down its author.

name: Submission
summary_text: Beautiful but unfulfilled Ashley has her eyes opened to the tantalizing possibilities of BDSM when she discovers the popular erotic novel SLAVE by Nolan Keats. But her fascination with the ...                See full summary »

name: Moving On
summary_text: Series of daytime plays set in contemporary Britain, all sharing the theme of someone going through some kind of change in their life.

name: Three Families
summary_text: Dramatisation of three real-life stories of how three families were each affected by Northern Ireland's restrictive abortion law before it was lifted in 2019.

name: Five Easy Pieces
summary_text: A dropout from upper-class America picks up work along the way on oil rigs when his life isn't spent in a squalid succession of bars, motels, and other points of interest.

name: The Manhattan Project
summary_text: A high school prodigy builds an atomic bomb with stolen plutonium to win the 45th National Science Fair and expose a nuclear weapons lab posing as nuclear medicine in Ithaca NY.

name: The Notorious Bettie Page
summary_text: The life of Bettie Page, a 1950s pin-up model and one of the first sex icons in America, who became the target of a Senate investigation because of her risqué bondage photos.

name: Leah Remini: Scientology and the Aftermath
summary_text: A series featuring stories from former members of the Church of Scientology whose lives have been affected by the Church's alleged harmful practices.

name: Secrets and Lies
summary_text: Each series, a detective focuses on the prime suspect in a murder case; but everyone has something to hide.

name: Home Town
summary_text: Ben and Erin Napier work with each other to change old homes into dream homes.

name: Infernal Affairs
summary_text: A story between a mole in the police department and an undercover cop. Their objectives are the same: to find out who is the mole, and who is the cop.

name: El Señor de los Cielos
summary_text: The most powerful drug trafficker of his time, this is the Life and times of Amado Carrillo Fuentes, "El Señor de los Cielos" (Lord of the Skies), a man who became the head of the Juárez ...                See full summary »

name: Life Goes On
summary_text: A modern All-American family deals with the struggles of life and love in mid-western suburbia.

name: The Story of O
summary_text: Photographer O's lover takes her to a Château, where she is, like other women there, naked, humiliated by whipping, sexual abuse by men etc. When O leaves, her lover gives her to his much older step-brother.

name: Unforgettable
summary_text: A woman sets out to make life a living hell for her ex-husband's new fiancée.

name: Ichi the Killer
summary_text: As sadomasochistic yakuza enforcer Kakihara searches for his missing boss he comes across Ichi, a repressed and psychotic killer who may be able to inflict levels of pain that Kakihara has only dreamed of achieving.

name: Waitress
summary_text: Jenna is a pregnant, unhappily married waitress in the deep south. She meets a newcomer to her town and falls into an unlikely relationship as a last attempt at happiness.

name: Yu-Gi-Oh!
summary_text: Yugi Moto solves an Ancient Egyptian Puzzle and brings forth a dark and powerful alter ego. Whenever he and his friends are threatened by evil in Duel Monster Card Game, this alter ego breaks out to save them.

name: Black Death
summary_text: Set during the time of the first outbreak of bubonic plague in England, a young monk is given the task of learning the truth about reports of people being brought back to life in a small village.

name: The Death & Life of John F. Donovan
summary_text: A decade after the death of an American television star, a young actor reminisces about the written correspondence he shared with him, as well as the impact those letters had on both their lives.

name: A Day to Die
summary_text: After killing a drug syndicate member while protecting a parolee, Connor Connolly has one day to pay two million dollars in reparations he doesn't have to Tyrone Pettis. He is forced to ask...                See full summary »

name: After the Dark
summary_text: At an international school in Jakarta, a philosophy teacher challenges his class of twenty graduating seniors to choose which ten of them would take shelter underground and reboot the human race in the event of a nuclear apocalypse.

name: Don't Let Go
summary_text: After a man's family dies in what appears to be a murder, he gets a phone call from one of the dead, his niece. He's not sure if she's a ghost or if he's going mad, but as it turns out, he's not.

name: Tell No One
summary_text: An accidental discovery near a doctor's estate stirs up some painful memories eight years after his wife's hideous murder, and now, things are bound to take a turn for the unexpected. Does the good doctor know more than he's letting on?

name: Attraction to Paris
summary_text: A college girl, studying abroad in Europe, stumbles upon a murder in progress, orchestrated by a terror cell, putting her life in danger as the main witness.

name: Nosferatu the Vampyre
summary_text: Count Dracula moves from Transylvania to Wismar, spreading the Black Plague across the land. Only a woman pure of heart can bring an end to his reign of horror.

name: Marianne
summary_text: When a famous horror writer goes back to her hometown, she finds out that the evil spirit that plagues her dreams is also there in real life.

name: La Mante
summary_text: A serial killer, nicknamed 'La Mante' decides to collaborate with the police when a string of murders that copycat her style suddenly appear.

name: The Last Days
summary_text: In late 1944, even as they faced imminent defeat, the Nazis expended enormous resources to kill or deport over 425,000 Jews during the "cleansing" of Hungary. This Oscar-winning documentary...                See full summary »

name: Ali
summary_text: A biography of sports legend Muhammad Ali, focusing on his triumphs and controversies between 1964 and 1974.

name: Inside Edge
summary_text: Inside Edge is the story of the Mumbai Mavericks, a T20 cricket franchise playing in the Powerplay League. Set in a landscape of conflicting interests, where selfishness is almost a virtue, where sex, money, and power are mere means to an end, Inside Edge is a story that pulls no punches, minces no words, and takes no prisoners. Come witness the game behind the game.

name: Next Gen
summary_text: A friendship with a top-secret robot turns a lonely girl's life into a thrilling adventure as they take on bullies, evil bots and a scheming madman.

name: Ernest Goes to Camp
summary_text: Ernest, a lovable loser who works as a summer camp handyman and dreams of becoming a guidance councilor, must find a way to inspire a group of juvenile delinquents as well as stop a shady strip mining company from closing the camp.

name: Hello, Dolly!
summary_text: Matchmaker Dolly Levi travels to Yonkers to find a partner for "half-a-millionaire" Horace Vandergelder, convincing his niece, his niece's intended, and his two clerks to travel to New York City along the way.

name: Whiskey Cavalier
summary_text: An FBI agent and his new partner, a CIA operative, embark on missions to save the world, but have to put up with each other first.

name: Cash Truck
summary_text: A mysterious vengeful man takes a job as a security guard for a money transport company amidst a series of violent robberies.

name: A Futile and Stupid Gesture
summary_text: In the 1970s and '80s, National Lampoon's success and influence creates a new media empire overseen in part by the brilliant and troubled Douglas Kenney.

name: Fisherman's Friends
summary_text: Ten fisherman from Cornwall are signed by Universal Records and achieve a top ten hit with their debut album of Sea Shanties.

name: Come to Daddy
summary_text: A man in his thirties travels to a remote cabin to reconnect with his estranged father.

name: Rachel Getting Married
summary_text: A young woman who has been in and out of rehab for the past ten years, returns home for the weekend for her sister's wedding.

name: Infidel
summary_text: An American man, played by Jim Caviezel, is kidnapped after a friend invites him to Cairo to speak out about recent militant uprisings. His wife heads to the city after hearing the news, determined to get him back.

name: House of Sand and Fog
summary_text: An abandoned wife is evicted from her house and starts a tragic conflict with her house's new owners.

name: Skate Kitchen
summary_text: A teenaged skateboarder makes friends with a bunch of other skateboarding girls in New York City.

name: Origin
summary_text: A group of strangers struggle for survival aboard a spaceship heading to a distant planet.

name: Planes
summary_text: A cropdusting plane with a fear of heights lives his dream of competing in a famous around-the-world aerial race.

name: Godzilla
summary_text: American nuclear weapons testing results in the creation of a seemingly unstoppable, dinosaur-like beast.

name: Confessions of a Teenage Drama Queen
summary_text: A teenage girl is convinced that her home city revolves around her until her family packs up and moves to the suburbs, where she finds herself competing for attention.

name: Would I Lie to You?
summary_text: Two teams, lead by their team leader (either Lee Mack or David Mitchell), have to try and make the other team believe their crazy stories.

name: The Oklahoman
summary_text: A doctor stops in a small Southwestern town to bury his wife. He decides to stay there and start a practice, but soon runs into violent cattle ranchers.

name: Tarzan the Ape Man
summary_text: While on an African expedition with her father, Jane Parker meets Tarzan, and the two become fascinated by each other.

name: The Last Detail
summary_text: Two Navy men are ordered to bring a young offender to prison, but decide to show him one last good time along the way.

name: The Ewok Adventure
summary_text: Wicket the Ewok and his friends agree to help two shipwrecked human children, Mace and Cindel, on a quest to find their parents.

name: Lapsis
summary_text: Struggling to support himself and his ailing younger brother, delivery man Ray takes a strange job in a strange new realm of the gig economy.

name: Mr. Jones
summary_text: A Welsh journalist breaks the news in the western media of the famine in Ukraine in the early 1930s.

name: Barnyard
summary_text: When the farmer's away, all the animals play, and sing, and dance. Eventually, though, someone has to step in and run things, a responsibility that ends up going to Otis, a carefree cow.

name: Choke
summary_text: A sex-addicted con-man pays for his mother's hospital bills by playing on the sympathies of those who rescue him from choking to death.

name: The Rook
summary_text: This London-set series centers on a young woman pursued by shadowy paranormal adversaries while grappling with extraordinary abilities of her own.

name: Reservation Road
summary_text: The lives of two families change forever after a fatal tragedy takes place on Reservation Road.

name: Star Wars: The Clone Wars
summary_text: After the Republic's victory on Christophsis, Anakin and his new apprentice Ahsoka Tano must rescue the kidnapped son of Jabba the Hutt. Political intrigue complicates their mission.

name: The Box
summary_text: A small wooden box arrives on the doorstep of a married couple, who know that opening it will grant them a million dollars and kill someone they don't know.

name: A Bad Moms Christmas
summary_text: As their own mothers drop in unexpectedly, our three under-appreciated and over-burdened moms rebel against the challenges and expectations of the Super Bowl for mothers: Christmas.

name: The Liberator
summary_text: The true story of one of the bloodiest battles of World War II.

name: 3Below: Tales of Arcadia
summary_text: A pair of teenage royals and their bodyguard escape from their home planet and try to blend in on Earth.

name: A House on Fire
summary_text: This movie is a semi-fictionalized account of a true life criminal case. Drs. Debora Green and Michael Farrar, married for seventeen years, have two offspring, young teen son Timothy Farrar...                See full summary »

name: Centervagt
summary_text: Add a Plot

name: Radium Girls
summary_text: In the 1920s a group of factory workers advocate for safer work conditions after some of their colleagues become ill from radium exposure.

name: The Ringer
summary_text: A young guy's only option to erase a really bad debt is to rig the Special Olympics by posing as a contestant.

name: Renegade
summary_text: After crooked cop Lieutenant "Dutch" Dixon kills his girlfriend and frames him for murder, Reno Raines escapes from jail and goes on the run.

name: Capitani
summary_text: In a Luxembourg village where everyone is keeping secrets, gruff police inspector Luc Capitani investigates the suspicious death of a 15-year-old girl.

name: Paranoid
summary_text: The murder of a female GP in a rural playground in front of numerous witnesses draws a group of detectives into an ever-darkening mystery that takes them across Europe, aided by mysterious notes sent by the "Ghost Detective".

name: Doctor Finlay
summary_text: Following his service in World War II, Dr. Finlay returns to the practice at Arden House, at a time when the National Health Service is about to be instituted.

name: Bacurau
summary_text: After the death of her grandmother, Teresa comes home to her matriarchal village in a near-future Brazil to find a succession of sinister events that mobilizes all of its residents.

name: Dirty Dancing
summary_text: A musical re-imagining of the 1987 film, Dirty Dancing (1987).

name: Love Spreads
summary_text: It is time to record the all important second album and Glass Heart is breaking in a million pieces. Away from touring and performing the band is not in harmony, and no amount of history in...                See full summary »

name: Curse of Chucky
summary_text: After her mother's mysterious death, Nica begins to suspect that the talking, red-haired doll her visiting niece has been playing with may be the key to recent bloodshed and chaos.

name: The Sister
summary_text: Almost a decade into his new devoted married life Nathan is rocked to the core when Bob, an unwelcome face from the past, turns up on his doorstep with shocking news, triggering a series of catastrophic decisions.

name: What Happens in Vegas
summary_text: A man and a woman are compelled, for legal reasons, to live life as a couple for a limited period of time. At stake is a large amount of money.

name: The Great Gatsby
summary_text: A Midwesterner becomes fascinated with his nouveau riche neighbor, who obsesses over his lost love.

name: Spy Kids 2: Island of Lost Dreams
summary_text: The Cortez siblings set out for a mysterious island, where they encounter a genetic scientist and a set of rival spy kids.

name: ParaNorman
summary_text: A misunderstood boy takes on ghosts, zombies and grown-ups to save his town from a centuries-old curse.

name: The Capture of the Green River Killer
summary_text: A pair of girls seeking adventure beyond the their Western Washington trailer park encounter the area's most ruthless serial killer. Based on Sheriff David Reichert's book, "Chasing the ...                See full summary »

name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles III
summary_text: When their closest friend April O'Neil discovers an ancient scepter with magical powers, the turtles must cow-a-bunga their way back to 17th century Japan to rescue her from the evil clutches of Lord Norinaga.

name: Fair Game
summary_text: CIA operative Valerie Plame discovers her identity is allegedly leaked by the government as payback for an op-ed article her husband wrote criticizing the Bush administration.

name: Dogs of Berlin
summary_text: A politically sensitive murder forces two disparate detectives into a battle with the Berlin underworld and a confrontation with their own corruption.

name: A Woman Scorned: The Betty Broderick Story
summary_text: Betty torments her husband with childish vandalism and verbal threats after he leaves her for another woman, but nobody anticipates what ends up happening as the games escalate.

name: The Strange Thing About the Johnsons
summary_text: A dark domestic horror drama about the ties that bind and the ties that really bind.

name: Baggage Claim
summary_text: Pledging to keep herself from being the oldest and the only woman in her entire family never to wed, Montana embarks on a thirty-day, thirty-thousand-mile expedition to charm a potential suitor into becoming her fiancé.

name: The Big Bird Cage
summary_text: Grier and Haig are thieving mercenaries who engineer a prison break from the outside.

name: Dominion
summary_text: Follows the perilous journey of a rebellious young soldier who discovers he's the unlikely savior of humanity.

name: Troop Zero
summary_text: In rural 1977 Georgia, a misfit girl dreams of life in outer space. When a competition offers her a chance to be recorded on NASA's Golden Record, she recruits a makeshift troop of Birdie Scouts, forging friendships that last a lifetime.

name: Paradise Lost
summary_text: A contemporary southern family saga that follows a prodigal son as he returns to his hometown and struggles to choose between his past and his future.

name: Funny Face
summary_text: An impromptu fashion shoot at a book store brings about a new fashion model discovery in the shop clerk.

name: Johnny Mnemonic
summary_text: A data courier, literally carrying a data package inside his head, must deliver it before he dies from the burden or is killed by the Yakuza.

name: A Hard Day's Night
summary_text: Over two "typical" days in the life of The Beatles, the boys struggle to keep themselves and Sir Paul McCartney's mischievous grandfather in check while preparing for a live television performance.

name: Carmen Sandiego
summary_text: The adventures of Carmen Sandiego, a globe-hopping master thief.

name: Jack and Jill
summary_text: Family guy Jack Sadelstein prepares for the annual event he dreads: the Thanksgiving visit of his fraternal twin sister, the needy and passive-aggressive Jill, who then refuses to leave.

name: Angie Tribeca
summary_text: Lone-wolf detective Angie Tribeca and a squad of committed LAPD detectives investigate the most serious cases, from the murder of a ventriloquist to a rash of baker suicides.

name: Ashes to Ashes
summary_text: DCI Gene Hunt swaps the Ford Cortina for an Audi Quattro and joins the London Metropolitan Police to deal with the 'Southern Nancy' criminal scum.

name: I Spit on Your Grave: Vengeance Is Mine
summary_text: Jennifer is still haunted by the memory of being gang raped and almost killed years ago. At her therapist's advice, she joins group therapy and meets similar women. She befriends one and they want more than just talk - justice/vengeance.

name: Made of Honor
summary_text: A guy in love with an engaged woman tries to win her over after she asks him to be her maid of honor.

name: The Vow
summary_text: A look at the experiences of the members of the NXIVM, an organization and sex cult who made headlines for being charged with sex trafficking and racketeering conspiracy.

name: In the Realm of the Senses
summary_text: A passionate telling of the story of Sada Abe, a woman whose affair with her master led to an obsessive and ultimately destructive sexual relationship.

name: Being the Ricardos
summary_text: Follows Lucy and Desi as they face a crisis that could end their careers and another that could end their marriage.

name: Wall Street: Money Never Sleeps
summary_text: Now out of prison but still disgraced by his peers, Gordon Gekko works his future son-in-law, an idealistic stock broker, when he sees an opportunity to take down a Wall Street enemy and rebuild his empire.

name: Ultrasound
summary_text: After his car breaks down, Glen spends one hell of an odd night with a married couple, setting into motion a chain of events that alter their lives plus those of several random strangers.

name: Dead Man's Shoes
summary_text: A disaffected soldier returns to his hometown to get even with the thugs who brutalized his mentally-challenged brother years ago.

name: The Forgotten
summary_text: A group of volunteers help find the identities of John & Jane Does who were murdered.

name: Blood for Dracula
summary_text: An ailing vampire count travels to Italy with his servant to find a bride.

name: Halloween II
summary_text: While Sheriff Brackett and Dr. Loomis hunt for Michael Myers, a traumatized Laurie is rushed to hospital, and the serial killer is not far behind her.

name: Robin Hood
summary_text: After 5 years of fighting in the crusades, Robin returns to England and leads a band of outlaws to outwit the Sheriff of Nottingham.

name: Cybill
summary_text: A struggling, middle-aged actress attempts to make a career for herself, all while surrounded by her hard-drinking best friend Maryann, her 2 former husbands, and her 2 daughters.

name: Hounds of Love
summary_text: Vicki Maloney is randomly abducted from a suburban street by a disturbed couple. As she observes the dynamic between her captors she quickly realises she must drive a wedge between them if she is to survive.

name: The City of Lost Children
summary_text: A scientist in a surrealist society kidnaps children to steal their dreams, hoping that they slow his aging process.

name: To Olivia
summary_text: The story of the tumultuous marriage between actress Patricia Neal and renowned writer Roald Dahl.

name: MythBusters
summary_text: A weekly documentary in which two Hollywood special effects experts attempt to debunk urban legends by directly testing them.

name: Maladolescenza
summary_text: A teen boy grows from playing and fighting with his German-shepherd dog, to playing kids and adult games with two equally young girls, in a dream-like forest which eventually turns eerie, and somber.

name: Brittany Runs a Marathon
summary_text: A young woman decides to make positive changes in her life by training for the New York City Marathon.

name: Center Stage
summary_text: A group of 12 teenagers from various backgrounds enroll at the American Ballet Academy in New York to make it as ballet dancers and each one deals with the problems and stress of training and getting ahead in the world of dance.

name: The Lion Guard
summary_text: Kion, the son of Simba, leads his friends known as the Lion Guard to protect the Pride Lands.

name: Shivers
summary_text: The residents of a suburban high-rise apartment building are being infected by a strain of parasites that turn them into mindless, sex-crazed fiends out to infect others by the slightest sexual contact.

name: Airplane Mode
summary_text: Horny American teenagers fly to Australia for sex at the social media convention in Sydney. Will Logan survive his fear of flying? Will the pilots survive passengers not using airplane mode? Will anyone survive?

name: In Living Color
summary_text: The Wayans siblings present an African-American focused sketch comedy show.

name: Bad Santa
summary_text: A miserable conman and his partner pose as Santa and his Little Helper to rob department stores on Christmas Eve. But they run into problems when the conman befriends a troubled kid.

name: Dating Amber
summary_text: Two school friends decide to start a pretend straight relationship in an effort to fit in.

name: Baywatch: Hawaiian Wedding
summary_text: Baywatch is busy saving lives at a beach near LA. They're invited to Mitch's Hawaii wedding with Allison, who looks like his dead ex. His ex-wife wants him back. CJ/Pam A. has a resort bar there.

name: How the West Was Won
summary_text: A family saga covering several decades of Westward expansion in the nineteenth century - including the Gold Rush, the Civil War, and the building of the railroads.

name: Waking Life
summary_text: A man shuffles through a dream meeting various people and discussing the meanings and purposes of the universe.

name: Fantasia
summary_text: A collection of animated interpretations of great works of Western classical music.

name: Red State
summary_text: Set in Middle America, a group of teens receive an online invitation for sex, though they soon encounter fundamentalists with a much more sinister agenda.

name: Daria
summary_text: A smart and cynical girl goes through teenage life as a proud outsider in a world of mainly idiotic adolescents and condescending adults.

name: Tales from the Crypt: Demon Knight
summary_text: A man on the run is hunted by a demon known as the Collector.

name: The Sandman
summary_text: When The Sandman is pulled from his realm and imprisoned on Earth, he languishes for decades before finally escaping.

name: Starred Up
summary_text: Eric Love, 19, is locked up in prison. On his first day, he assaults another inmate and several guards. He's offered group therapy and his dad, an inmate as well, tries to talk sense into him. Can he be rehabilitated?

name: My Mister
summary_text: A man in his 40's withstands the weight of life. A woman in her 20's goes through different experiences, but also withstands the weight of her life. The man and woman get together to help each other.

name: Sightless
summary_text: After an attack renders her blind, Ellen Ashland withdraws from the world to recover. But soon she plunges into paranoia, unable to convince anyone that her assailant has returned to terrorize her by hiding in plain sight.

name: Stalag 17
summary_text: When two escaping American World War II prisoners are killed, the German P.O.W. camp barracks black marketeer, J.J. Sefton, is suspected of being an informer.

name: La fleur du mal
summary_text: Three generations of a wealthy Bordeaux family are caught in the crossfire when Anne decides to run for mayor, thanks to a political pamphlet that revives an old murder scandal.

name: Calendar Girls
summary_text: A Women's Institute chapter's fundraising effort for a local hospital by posing nude for a calendar becomes a media sensation.

name: People of Earth
summary_text: Journalist Ozzie Graham is skeptical when he investigates a support group for oddballs who think they have been abducted by aliens -- yet the more he learns, the more confused, intrigued, and seduced he becomes.

name: Legend of the Guardians: The Owls of Ga'Hoole
summary_text: When a young owl is abducted by an evil Owl army, he must escape with new-found friends and seek the legendary Guardians to stop the menace.

name: The Sword in the Stone
summary_text: A poor boy named Arthur learns the power of love, kindness, knowledge and bravery with the help of a wizard called Merlin in the path to become one of the most beloved kings in English history.

name: The Lizzie McGuire Movie
summary_text: Lizzie McGuire has graduated from middle school and takes a trip to Rome, Italy with her class. And what was supposed to be only a normal trip, becomes a teenager's dream come true.

name: Bigfoot Family
summary_text: Follow up to Son of Bigfoot: Father uses his new fame to fight against an Alaska oil company but when he disappears the son, the mother, a raccoon and a bear head North to rescue him.

name: The North Water
summary_text: The North Water tells the story of Patrick Sumner, a disgraced ex-army surgeon who signs up as ship's doctor on a whaling expedition to the Arctic. On board he meets Henry Drax, the ...                See full summary »

name: Flubber
summary_text: An absent-minded professor discovers "flubber," a rubber-like super-bouncy substance.

name: Anaconda 3: Offspring
summary_text: A mercenary-for-hire accepts a mission from a billionaire to capture a dangerous snake that could possibly help cure a terminal illness.

name: Emma
summary_text: Emma Woodhouse seems to be perfectly content, to have a loving father for whom she cares, friends, and a home. But Emma has a terrible habit: matchmaking. She cannot resist finding suitors ...                See full summary »

name: Tomcats
summary_text: At the wedding of a friend, the remaining bachelors bet on staying single. 7 years later, one of the 2 remaining loses $51000 in Vegas. He must get the other guy married to cash in and pay his debt or die. A cute woman helps him.

name: Cosmoball
summary_text: An enormous spaceship hovers over Earth-this is a stadium, which hosts sports events that resemble soccer but at mind-boggling speeds. The name of the game is cosmoball.

name: The Guest Book
summary_text: For a tiny cottage in a tiny town, this place sure will see lots of baggage. Each episode, new guests will bring their own special brand of crazy to this new TBS comedy from My Name Is Earl (2005) Creator Greg Garcia.

name: Around the World in 80 Days
summary_text: A Victorian Englishman bets that with the new steamships and railways he can circumnavigate the globe in eighty days.

name: Sweet Carolina
summary_text: Marketing executive, Josie, returns home when she becomes the unexpected guardian of her niece and nephew. While there, she reconnects with Cooper, her high school boyfriend.

name: The Bionic Woman
summary_text: After fully recovering from her nearly fatal bout of bionic rejection, Jaime Sommers, the first female cyborg, is assigned to spy missions of her own.

name: Kill Bill: The Whole Bloody Affair
summary_text: The Bride must kill her ex-boss and lover Bill who betrayed her at her wedding rehearsal, shot her in the head and took away her unborn daughter. But first, she must make the other four members of the Deadly Viper Assassination Squad suffer.

name: Sid and Nancy
summary_text: The relationship between Sid Vicious, bassist for British punk group Sex Pistols, and his girlfriend Nancy Spungen is portrayed.

name: Spellbound
summary_text: A psychiatrist protects the identity of an amnesia patient accused of murder while attempting to recover his memory.

name: Mischief
summary_text: 1956. Obsessed with the hottest girl in class, a gawky high school student takes a crash course in teenage coolness from his motorcycle rebel neighbour.

name: Just Add Magic
summary_text: Three friends cook up spells to unlock the secrets and curses that befall their small town.

name: The Second Best Exotic Marigold Hotel
summary_text: As the Best Exotic Marigold Hotel has only a single remaining vacancy, posing a rooming predicament for two fresh arrivals, Sonny Kapoor (Dev Patel) pursues his expansionist dream of opening a second hotel.

name: Andrei Rublev
summary_text: The life, times and afflictions of the fifteenth-century Russian iconographer St. Andrei Rublev.

name: Merlin
summary_text: Legendary wizard Merlin tells his story of his war against Queen Mab of the Sidhe and his creation of Camelot.

name: Savage Streets
summary_text: A teenage vigilante seeks revenge on a group of violent thugs who raped her handicapped sister and killed her best friend.

name: Middle Men
summary_text: Chronicles Jack Harris, one of the pioneers of internet commerce, as he wrestles with his morals, and struggles not to drown in a sea of con men, mobsters, drug addicts, and porn stars.

name: Little Monsters
summary_text: A washed-up musician teams up with a teacher and a kids show personality to protect young children from a sudden outbreak of zombies.

name: Jongens
summary_text: A sexually awakening gay teen athlete finds himself in a budding relationship with his mutually attracted relay race teammate.

name: Ibiza
summary_text: A young American woman and her two best friends seek out a hot DJ in Spain.

name: Blues Brothers 2000
summary_text: Elwood must reunite the old band, with a few new members, and go on another "Mission from God."

name: Darkness Falls
summary_text: After his wife's suicide, Detective Jeff Anderson becomes convinced that she has been murdered. Obsessed with his investigation, he finds out that his wife was the victim of a team of father-and-son serial killers and sets out to stop them.

name: The Bletchley Circle
summary_text: In 1952, four women who worked at the wartime code-breaking centre, Bletchley Park, reunite to track down a serial killer.

name: Yojimbo
summary_text: A crafty ronin comes to a town divided by two criminal gangs and decides to play them against each other to free the town.

name: The Awful Truth
summary_text: A married couple file an amicable divorce, but find it harder to let go of each other than they initially thought.

name: Packed to the Rafters
summary_text: Meet Dave and Julie Rafter - just your average Australians with three grown-up children. On the eve of their twenty-fifth wedding-anniversary it seems they're at last about to have the house to themselves.

name: Thirteen Lives
summary_text: A rescue mission is assembled in Thailand where a group of young boys and their soccer coach are trapped in a system of underground caves that are flooding.

name: Rosalie
summary_text: West Point cadet Dick Thorpe falls in love with a girl, who turns out to be a princess from an European kingdom.

name: The Little Mermaid 2: Return to the Sea
summary_text: To protect her from a sea witch, Ariel's daughter is not allowed in the ocean; but when she becomes 12, she runs away to an adventure under the sea.

name: Highlander: The Final Dimension
summary_text: Deceived that he had won the Prize, Connor MacLeod awakens from a peaceful life when an entombed immortal magician comes seeking the Highlander.

name: Scrooged
summary_text: A selfish, cynical television executive is haunted by three spirits bearing lessons on Christmas Eve.

name: Jo Nesbø's Headhunters
summary_text: An accomplished headhunter risks everything to obtain a valuable painting owned by a former mercenary.

name: Chemistry
summary_text: The scandalous lives of Liz and Michael, a cop and a lawyer who meet in a near-fatal coincidence. Drama and comedy with inevitable and powerful chemistry between a man and woman that completely alter a destined life plan.

name: She-Ra: Princess of Power
summary_text: Princess Adora raises her magic sword and becomes She-Ra, the most powerful woman in the universe, to aid her friends in defeating the Evil Horde so their planet Etheria can be free.

name: Eddie the Eagle
summary_text: The story of Eddie Edwards, the notoriously tenacious British underdog ski jumper who charmed the world at the 1988 Winter Olympics.

name: Troll 2
summary_text: A vacationing family discovers that the entire town they're visiting is inhabited by goblins, disguised as humans, who plan to eat them.

name: The International
summary_text: An Interpol agent attempts to expose a high-profile financial institution's role in an international arms dealing ring.

name: The Girl on the Train
summary_text: The story follows a recent divorcee who spends her daily commute fantasizing about a seemingly perfect couple who live in a house that her train passes daily, but something shocking happens there one day.

name: Flaked
summary_text: A recovering alcoholic faces reality after a life changing accident in Venice Beach, California.

name: The Brood
summary_text: A man tries to uncover an unconventional psychologist's therapy techniques on his institutionalized wife, amidst a series of brutal murders.

name: Violation
summary_text: A troubled woman on the edge of divorce returns home to her younger sister after years apart. But when her sister and brother-in-law betray her trust, she embarks on a vicious crusade of revenge.

name: The Worst Witch
summary_text: Mildred lives an ordinary until the day that Maud Spellbody crashes her broomstick into their balcony. Maud then introduces Mildred to Cackle's Academy - a school for young witches set high on a mountaintop.

name: Drumline
summary_text: A band director recruits a Harlem street drummer to play at a Southern university.

name: Caché
summary_text: A married couple is terrorized by a series of surveillance videotapes left on their front porch.

name: Bait
summary_text: A freak tsunami traps shoppers at a coastal Australian supermarket inside the building - along with 12-foot Great White Sharks.

name: Victory
summary_text: As allied P.O.W.s prepare for a soccer game against the German National Team to be played in Nazi-occupied Paris, the French Resistance and British officers are making plans for the team's escape.

name: Ninja Scroll
summary_text: A vagabond swordsman is aided by a beautiful ninja girl and a crafty spy in confronting a demonic clan of killers - with a ghost from his past as their leader - who are bent on overthrowing the Tokugawa Shogunate.

name: After Sex
summary_text: Vignettes about eight different couples at varying points in their relationships, each having conversations immediately after having sex.

name: American Pie Presents: Beta House
summary_text: Erik and Cooze start college and pledge the Beta House fraternity, presided over by none other than legendary Dwight Stifler.

name: Celebrity Sex Tape
summary_text: When a group of nerds leak a washed-up celebrity's sex tape, the publicity revives the actress's career and other Hollywood rejects want to star in the guys next "production."

name: Point of No Return
summary_text: A government fakes the death of a criminal to turn this young woman into a killer on its service.

name: First Knight
summary_text: Lancelot falls in love with Guinevere, who is due to be married to King Arthur. Meanwhile, a violent warlord tries to seize power from Arthur and his Knights of the Round Table.

name: Pump Up the Volume
summary_text: Mark runs a pirate radio station and causes an uproar when he speaks his mind and enthralls fellow teens.

name: A Royal Affair
summary_text: A young queen, who is married to an insane king, falls secretly in love with her physician - and together they start a revolution that changes a nation forever.

name: Kathmandu Connection
summary_text: An officer is murdered, a hotelier is kidnapped, and a reporter is stalked against the backdrop of the 1993 Mumbai Blast.

name: Tiptoes
summary_text: The story of a peculiar love triangle involving two brothers.

name: The Soul
summary_text: The founder of a corporation developing a futuristic cancer treatment is brutally murdered, and a prosecutor sidelined by the illness asks to lead the case, assisted by his newly pregnant detective wife.

name: Hannah Montana: The Movie
summary_text: As Hannah Montana's popularity begins to take over her life, Miley Stewart, on the urging from her father takes a trip to her hometown of Crowley Corners, Tennessee to get some perspective on what matters in life the most.

name: Luna
summary_text: While touring in Italy, a recently-widowed American opera singer has an incestuous relationship with her 15-year-old son to help him overcome his heroin addiction.

name: American Satan
summary_text: A young rock band, half of its members from England and half from the U.S., drops out of college and moves to the Sunset Strip to chase their dreams.

name: Shantaram
summary_text: A heroin addict incarcerated for a robbery escapes prison and reinvents himself as a doctor in the slums of Bombay; his ties to the crime underworld there lead him to Afghanistan, where he ...                See full summary »

name: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim
summary_text: After escaping execution, the last living Dragonborn must grow in strength and power to defeat the dragons that have once again begun to plague the land of Skyrim.

name: Bugsy
summary_text: The story of how Benjamin "Bugsy" Siegel started Las Vegas.

name: With/In
summary_text: An anthology film set during the COVID-19 pandemic.

name: The Iron Lady
summary_text: An elderly Margaret Thatcher talks to the imagined presence of her recently deceased husband as she struggles to come to terms with his death while scenes from her past life, from girlhood to British prime minister, intervene.

name: The 33
summary_text: Based on the real-life event, when a gold and copper mine collapses, it traps 33 miners underground for 69 days.

name: The Conformist
summary_text: A weak-willed Italian man becomes a fascist flunky who goes abroad to arrange the assassination of his old teacher, now a political dissident.

name: The Jinx: The Life and Deaths of Robert Durst
summary_text: Filmmaker Andrew Jarecki examines the complicated life of reclusive real estate icon Robert Durst, the key suspect in a series of unsolved crimes.

name: Simon & Simon
summary_text: Two brothers of disparate tastes and manners run a private detective agency.

name: Cure
summary_text: A frustrated detective deals with the case of several gruesome murders committed by people who have no recollection of what they've done.

name: Roots
summary_text: An adaptation of Alex Haley's "Roots", chronicling the history of an African man sold to slavery in America, and his descendants.

name: Frantic
summary_text: In a hotel room in Paris, a doctor comes out of the shower and finds that his wife has disappeared. He soon finds himself caught up in a world of intrigue, espionage, gangsters, drugs and murder.

name: Dead & Buried
summary_text: A suspense horror film set in a small coastal town where, after a series of gory murders commited by mobs of townspeople against visiting tourists, the corpses begin to come back to life.

name: Delicatessen
summary_text: Post-apocalyptic surrealist black comedy about the landlord of an apartment building who occasionally prepares a delicacy for his odd tenants.
